name: Presentation Generator
rationale: Multi-agent workflow with 5 sequential phases: Research (research-agent) → Content Generation (content-agent) → Design Decisions (design-agent) → Asset Collection (asset-agent) → HTML Generation (generator-agent). Each phase uses multiple LLM calls with planning, execution, and reflection.

name: Grid Layout System
rationale: Pure algorithmic grid calculations (12-column system). No LLM needed - uses mathematical layout algorithms.

name: Typography System
rationale: Algorithmic font sizing and readability calculations. Uses type scale formulas, no LLM required.

name: Color Palettes & WCAG Compliance
rationale: Algorithmic color palette generation using color theory (60-30-10 rule, complementary/triadic schemes). WCAG contrast ratio calculations are pure math. No LLM needed.

name: Chart Integration
rationale: Chart.js integration for data visualization. Pure UI rendering, no LLM needed.

name: Text Overflow Handling
rationale: Primarily uses compression/splitting algorithms. While it has a 'summarize' option that could use LLM, the core functionality is algorithmic text manipulation.

name: Master Slides & Branding
rationale: Template creation and application. Pure UI state management and CSS, no LLM needed.

name: Transitions & Animations
rationale: CSS animation generation (fade, slide, zoom, flip). Pure frontend, no LLM needed.

name: Accessibility Engine
rationale: WCAG AAA compliance checking using rule-based validation. Contrast ratio calculations, ARIA validation. Alt-text generation could use LLM but core is rule-based.

name: Export Engine
rationale: PDF/PPTX/HTML generation from slide data. Pure file format conversion, no LLM needed.

name: Image Optimization
rationale: Image compression, resizing, format conversion. Pure image processing algorithms (Sharp, etc.), no LLM needed.

name: Content Validation
rationale: Rule-based content validation, spell check, grammar check. Uses libraries like Hunspell, no LLM needed.

name: LLM-as-Judge Quality Control
rationale: Direct Gemini 2.5 Flash API call to evaluate slide quality. Single request-response pattern scoring 5 criteria (visual hierarchy, whitespace, readability, relevance, professionalism).

name: Interactive Widgets
rationale: Widget embedding and configuration. Pure UI component management, no LLM needed.

name: Real-time Synchronization
rationale: WebSocket-based real-time updates. Pure state synchronization, no LLM needed.

name: Speaker Notes UI
rationale: Text editor for presenter notes. Pure CRUD operations, no LLM needed.

name: Slide Duplication & Reordering
rationale: Copy/paste slides, drag-and-drop reordering. Pure state management, no LLM needed.

name: Template Library
rationale: Template browsing and application. Pure UI state management, no LLM needed.

name: Multi-Language Support (i18n)
rationale: Internationalization with 10 languages, RTL support. Uses translation dictionaries and i18n libraries. Translation could optionally use LLM but core is dictionary-based.

name: Video Embed Support
rationale: YouTube/Vimeo embedding via iframe codes. Pure URL parsing and embed code generation, no LLM needed.

name: Custom Font Upload
rationale: TTF/OTF/WOFF font file upload and management. Pure file handling, no LLM needed.

name: Collaboration Features
rationale: Real-time collaboration, comments, permissions. Pure state management and WebSocket, no LLM needed.

name: Version History
rationale: Snapshot-based version control with restore. Pure state management, no LLM needed.

name: AI Image Generation (DALL-E 3)
rationale: Direct DALL-E 3 API call for image generation. Single request-response pattern with prompt → image URL.

name: Data Import (CSV, Excel, JSON)
rationale: CSV/Excel/JSON parsing and chart generation. Pure file parsing (PapaParse, xlsx libraries), no LLM needed.

name: Presentation Analytics
rationale: View tracking, engagement metrics, analytics dashboard. Pure data aggregation and visualization, no LLM needed.

name: Mobile App (React Native)
rationale: Mobile app sync and offline mode. Pure state synchronization, no LLM needed.

name: Live Presentation Mode
rationale: WebSocket-based live presentation with slide navigation sync. Pure real-time state management, no LLM needed.

name: Voice Narration (Text-to-Speech)
rationale: Web Speech API or cloud TTS service (Google TTS, Amazon Polly). Direct API call text → audio, single request-response.

name: API Access for Developers
rationale: API key management, rate limiting configuration. Pure CRUD operations, no LLM needed.

name: Interactive Elements (Polls, Quizzes, Q&A)
rationale: Poll/quiz creation and result aggregation. Pure UI form handling and data collection, no LLM needed.

name: Themes Marketplace
rationale: Theme browsing, purchasing, installation. E-commerce and theme management, no LLM needed.

name: 3D Animations (Three.js)
rationale: Three.js 3D scene creation and rendering. Pure WebGL rendering, no LLM needed.

name: Design Import (Figma/Sketch)
rationale: Figma/Sketch file parsing and conversion to slides. Pure file format parsing and conversion, no LLM needed.

name: AR Presentation (WebXR)
rationale: WebXR AR session management. Pure browser AR API, no LLM needed.

name: Blockchain NFTs
rationale: Web3/Ethers.js blockchain integration for NFT minting. Pure smart contract interaction, no LLM needed.
